import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../assets/user.png'; import styles from '../styles/Username.module.css' import {Toaster} from 'react-hot-toast'; import {useFormik} from 'formik'; import { passwordValidate } from '../helper/validate'; export default function Recoveryd() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues:{ password:'' }, validate :passwordValidate, validateOnBlur:false, validateOnChange:false, onSubmit:async values=>{ console.log(values) } }) return (
